transcript_chunks.text: Andy you hate Super Mario Sunshine and I couldn't be proud of you look at you out there just you're doing it getting these Nintendo kids riled up and declaring it the worst Mario of all time yeah I like I like playing up a character on stream you know you fake the outrage you know you rage bait you get get the clicks you get clicks you get people in there uh but this is the most like sincere I feel about wow okay for real this really feels like all of the core Nintendo Minds went on vacation for 2 months and said somebody else make a game
